sections.text:
28-367.Sexual abuse, defined.

Sexual abuse shall include sexual assault as described in section 28-319 or 28-320 and incest as described in section 28-703.

SourceLaws 1988, LB 463, ยง 20.

Annotations

Defendant's conviction of sexual abuse of a vulnerable adult reversed because evidence was insufficient to establish element of sexual contact. State v. Hulshizer, 245 Neb. 244, 512 N.W.2d 372 (1994).
